post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, December 3
post.Content:
A quiet week this week:

  • Don Laiquit has open sourced Crypto FX Wallet - "a layer working above the command line wallet of a crypto node. It handles just a limited subset of all the available commands."
  • Adam Carroll has published an article showing how to use the Java Packager with JDK 11 to package up a JavaFX application.
